remarks: The partial isomorphism A maps to a set of vectors in partial vector space A. (Contributed by NM, 1-Jan-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
diassdva.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
diassdva.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
diassdva.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
diassdva.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoA ` K ) ` W ) $.
diassdva.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
diassdva.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
diassdvaN $p |- ( ( ( K e. Y /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) ) -> ( I ` X ) C_ V ) $.
